title: BODYSTYLER® The Ultimate Maternity Support Tanks by BLANQI®
description:
Designed for maximum support and comfort when nothing but the ultimate will do, BLANQI's maternity support tanks relieve discomfort so you can enjoy every moment of your pregnancy.

THE BODYSTYLER: 
- Alleviates pressure with built-in belly support.
- Smoothes the hips, back, and sides for a secure fit.
- Lifts the belly and improves posture with built-in X-shaped back support.
- High-performance Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry with breathable comfort.

- Under-bust design allows you to wear your favorite, best fitting bra during each trimester.
- Holds up unbuttoned bottoms so you can wear your pre-pregnancy clothes longer.
- Secures loose maternity bottoms that you haven't grown into yet.
- Exceptionally detailed and highly technical design makes the incredible, life-changing experience of being pregnant easier.
- As your baby grows, the super stretchy, velvety smooth belly panel comfortably expands without restriction.


- This maternity Bodystyler features a seamless knit made of 90% Polyamide and 10% Elastane.
- Buttery, soft touch on the inside feels luxurious against the skin.
- A matte, smooth exterior prevents clothes from clinging.
- Seamless to reduce irritation caused by chafing seams.
- Superior recovery even after being stretched out.

transcripts:
We designed our under bust hang with the built in belly support  to alleviate pressure and pain during pregnancy. The X design on the back acts as an anchor to provide ultimate support in the front underneath the belly. We designed our signature belly support tank with an under bust scoop that way you can wear whatever bra is most comfortable to you. So our bottom band actually works as a belly band and allows you to wear it unbuttoned and hold your pants in place. 

Our support tanks smooths the hips, sides, and back for a streamline look perfect under any outfit. Nine months is too short to buy a whole new baby bump only wardrobe. But it's too long to be uncomfortable and in pain. So that's why our main focus here is to create designs that make life easier.
